nodes.title:
1/2 What is the biggest risk for #bitcoin?

1. government ban / law
2. quantum computing
3. derivatives / futures
4. software bugs / hacks
5. centralized mining (China)
6. forks / new better bitcoin

Note, poll is spread over 2 tweets!!

1/Announcement: I'm now devoting most of my time to my new music project

For 5+ yrs straight after that I tweeted and RT'd about bitcoin every day

I did all this with no thought of reward/compensation
